Virtual Glasses: A virtual reality headset that allows users to see and interact with virtual objects as if they were real.
Smart Glasses: Glasses that are equipped with sensors and augmented reality technology, allowing users to access information and interact with their environment in new ways.
Glasses that change color: Glasses that can change color depending on the environment or mood of the wearer.
Glasses with built-in speakers: Glasses that have built-in speakers, allowing users to listen to music or take calls without having to take their phone out of their pocket.
Glasses that can detect eye: Glasses that can detect eyeze and adjust the focus automatically, making it easier for users to see clearly.
